en.title: Echoes in the Grid: Why I Built EchoVault
en.description: A founder story about science fiction, networks, grief, and building EchoVault as a humane way to leave more of ourselves for the people who come after.
en.tagline: From watching Tron and reading cyberpunk as a kid, to building the real network Grid, to realizing years after my dad died at 59 that I wanted to leave more than a few photos and scattered files.
